vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Planned Development District for MF-2(A) Multifamily District uses on property zoned a CR Community Retail District, on the southwest side of Simpson Stuart Road and the west side of Bonnie View Road
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval, subject to a development plan and conditions
Z190-352(CT)
